name: Netorare Wife -Yukiko- 20 Years After Marriage
description:
An adult visual novel game and its hentai game with full animation, Tell a story about a husband and wife who are in debt because the husband made a mistake in investing using company money.
To save both of their lives from debt collectors and the police, the husband asks for help from his junior at the office. The junior was named "Takahashi Nishio". Even though Nishio was a Junior to their husband, Nishio was the son of the owner of the company.
The husband is well aware that only Nishio can help him get out of the problems he is facing.
Of course, Nishio was willing to help because their relationship was very close, but for Nishio's help, the husband had to pay quite a fortune, especially his 41-year-old wife.
Will the husband regret his decision??
